attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE WOULD LIKE THE GOVERNMENT TO TAKE A MORE SERIOUS APPROACH IN DEALING WITH YOBS [YOUTHS] HANGING AROUND STREET CORNERS, DRINKING MOST UNDER-AGED,MAKING RESIDENTS UNEASY.

rejection.details: The main sentence of your petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
